description:
When creating relationships between entities, guide users through selecting the correct relationship type with visual examples and plain-language descriptions. Prevent incorrect relationship types before they're created.

**Rationale:** Complex domain models with many entity types and relationship possibilities confuse users. Wrong relationships corrupt data integrity and require cleanup. Proactive guidance reduces errors at the source.
title: Relationship Creation Disambiguation Wizard
